SqlString.String: SELECT fd.Prod_ID as ProdID,fd.Batch_Date as BatchDate,f.Agent_ID as VendeeID, NVL(ugt.DegreeIdx,666) + DECODE(Market_Pro,'A',1000,2000) as DegreeIdx, SUM(fd.Cntt_qty) as LeavedQty,f.DISP_WAREH_ID as WareID,NVL(pwr.Days,@DefWareOrderDays) as Days FROM Product p INNER JOIN Mbfs_Fuc_Dtl fd ON fd.Prod_id=p.Prod_id INNER JOIN Mbfs_Fuc f ON f.ID=fd.Mbfs_Fuc_ID INNER JOIN mbfs_agent_detail ma ON ma.Agent_id=f.Agent_ID LEFT JOIN PH_UnitDegrees ug ON ug.UnitID=f.Agent_ID LEFT JOIN PH_UnitDegreeType ugt ON ugt.DegreeCode=ug.DegreeCode LEFT JOIN PH_WareRecDays pwr ON pwr.UnitID=f.DISP_WAREH_ID WHERE p.PROD_CLS_ID=@ProdClsID GROUP BY fd.Prod_ID,fd.Batch_Date,f.Agent_ID, NVL(ugt.DegreeIdx,666) + DECODE(Market_Pro,'A',1000,2000),f.DISP_WAREH_ID,NVL(pwr.Days,@DefWareOrderDays);

SELECT DISTINCT p.PROD_CLS_ID as ProdClsID FROM Product p INNER JOIN Mbfs_Fuc_Dtl fd ON fd.Prod_id=p.Prod_id WHERE p.PROD_CLS_ID>=@MinProdClsID AND p.PROD_CLS_ID<=@MaxProdClsID ORDER BY p.PROD_CLS_ID;
